original: @99a # // rgya gar skad du /üîΩsva ro da ya k'a la yu ga pha la au pa de sha / bod skad du /
analyzed: @99a # // rgya gar skad du / sva ro da ya k'a la yu ga pha la au pa de sha / bod skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:üîΩSvarodayakalayugaphalapaulomaüîΩIn Tibetan:

original: dbyangs 'char ba'i dus sbyor gyi 'bras bu nye bar mkho ba /
analyzed: dbyangs 'char ba'i dus sbyor gyi 'bras bu nye bar mkho ba /
translated: The Requisite Result of the Ascending Tone

original: a'a rya manydzu shri ye na ma:/
analyzed: a'a rya manydzu shri ye na ma:/
translated: Homage to Noble Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´!

original: lug gi dus sbyor shar ma thag tu /
analyzed: lug gi dus sbyor shar ma thag tu /
translated: Immediately after the Aries yuga has dawned,

original: dgra dang 'thab pa dang dbang bskur ba dang / 'thab rtsod kyi las dang / khams la sogs pa la spa ba dang // rang dang gzhan 'brel par byed pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o //
analyzed: dgra dang 'thab pa dang dbang bskur ba dang / 'thab rtsod kyi las dang / khams la sogs pa la spa ba dang // rang dang gzhan 'brel par byed pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o //
translated: one should perform activities such as fighting with enemies, consecration, quarrelsome deeds, traveling to other regions, and making connections with others.üîΩWhen the Taurus yuga has dawned,

original: glang gi dus sbyor shar ba dang / bag ma dang / brtag pa'i las bya'o //
analyzed: glang gi dus sbyor shar ba dang / bag ma dang / brtag pa'i las bya'o //
translated: one should perform activities such as taking a bride and investigating.

original: khang pa'i bya ba dang / rang gi gnas su gzhug pa dang / gzhon nu ma'i gos dang / rgyan la sogs pa bya ba dang / sbyin pa'i las dang / zhing nyo ba dang / zhing las bya'o //
analyzed: khang pa'i bya ba dang / rang gi gnas su gzhug pa dang / gzhon nu ma'i gos dang / rgyan la sogs pa bya ba dang / sbyin pa'i las dang / zhing nyo ba dang / zhing las bya'o //
translated: One should perform activities such as building a house, bringing it into one's possession, making clothes and ornaments for a young woman, giving gifts, buying a field, and working the field.

original: 'khrig pa'i dus sbyor shar ba dang / sgyu rtsal gyi las dang bzo dang rgyan la sogs pa dang / gzhan gyi dus sbyor du bshad pa thams cad kyang bya'o //
analyzed: 'khrig pa'i dus sbyor shar ba dang / sgyu rtsal gyi las dang bzo dang rgyan la sogs pa dang / gzhan gyi dus sbyor du bshad pa thams cad kyang bya'o //
translated: and when the work of the arts, crafts, ornaments, and so forth, and all that is explained as the conjunction of others, should be done.

original: karka ta'i dus sbyor ba bab pa na /
analyzed: karka ta'i dus sbyor ba bab pa na /
translated: When the Cancer conjunction occurs,

original: rdzing bu dang / khron pa'i las dang / chu bsgyur ba dang / rgyas pa'i las dang / grub pa'i las dang / mthar thon pa'i las rnams bya'o //
analyzed: rdzing bu dang / khron pa'i las dang / chu bsgyur ba dang / rgyas pa'i las dang / grub pa'i las dang / mthar thon pa'i las rnams bya'o //
translated: the work of ponds and wells, the work of water, the work of expansion, the work of accomplishment, and the work of final completion should be done.

original: seng ge'i dus sbyor shar ba'i dus su /
analyzed: seng ge'i dus sbyor shar ba'i dus su /
translated: When the Leo conjunction arises,

original: tshong bya ba dang / shes par bya ba'i las dang / tshong phran dang / he ha las dang / mi'i bdag por dbang bskur ba'i las dang / gzhan dang mthun par bya ba dang / lug gi dus sbyor du bshad pa thams cad kyang bya'o //
analyzed: tshong bya ba dang / shes par bya ba'i las dang / tshong phran dang / he ha las dang / mi'i bdag por dbang bskur ba'i las dang / gzhan dang mthun par bya ba dang / lug gi dus sbyor du bshad pa thams cad kyang bya'o //
translated: the work of trade, the work of knowledge, the work of small trade, the work of he he, the work of anointing the lord of men, the work of being in accord with others, and all that is explained as the conjunction of Aries should be done.

original: bu mo'i dus sbyor la sman gyi las dang / zas sbyor dang / bzo bya ba dang / brtan pa dang / g-yo ba'i las dang / rgyas pa'i las thams cad bya'o //
analyzed: bu mo'i dus sbyor la sman gyi las dang / zas sbyor dang / bzo bya ba dang / brtan pa dang / g-yo ba'i las dang / rgyas pa'i las thams cad bya'o //
translated: In the lunar mansion of the virgin, all activities of medicine, cooking, craftsmanship, stable and mobile activities, and expansion should be done.

original: srang gi dus sbyor shar ba'i tshe /
analyzed: srang gi dus sbyor shar ba'i tshe /
translated: When the lunar mansion of the scales rises,

original: so nam bya ba dang / tshong dang brtan pa'i las dang / sgyu 'phrul dang / srang la sogs pa la gzhal ba'i las bya'o //
analyzed: so nam bya ba dang / tshong dang brtan pa'i las dang / sgyu 'phrul dang / srang la sogs pa la gzhal ba'i las bya'o //
translated: agricultural work, commerce, stable activities, magic, and activities of weighing on scales and so forth should be done.

original: sdig pa shar ba'i dus sbyor la /
analyzed: sdig pa shar ba'i dus sbyor la /
translated: In the lunar mansion of Scorpio,

original: 'bebs pa'i las dang / drag po'i las dang / khrag gi las dang / rgyal po bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / dbang bskur bya ba dang / dpa' bo'i mtshon cha bya ba'i las dang / brtan pa'i bya ba rtsom pa dag bya'o //
analyzed: 'bebs pa'i las dang / drag po'i las dang / khrag gi las dang / rgyal po bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / dbang bskur bya ba dang / dpa' bo'i mtshon cha bya ba'i las dang / brtan pa'i bya ba rtsom pa dag bya'o //
translated: activities of rainmaking, wrathful activities, bloody activities, serving the king, conferring empowerment, activities of heroic weapons, and the undertaking of stable activities should be done.

original: gzhu'i dus sbyor shar dus su /
analyzed: gzhu'i dus sbyor shar dus su /
translated: When the lunar mansion of Sagittarius rises,

original: gzhan du sog pa dang / rgyas pa'i las dang / bag ma'i las dang / phyugs kyi 'dul sbyang bya ba dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / nad zad par byed pa la sogs @99b ba bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan du sog pa dang / rgyas pa'i las dang / bag ma'i las dang / phyugs kyi 'dul sbyang bya ba dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / nad zad par byed pa la sogs @99b ba bya'o //
translated: Other activities include moving activities such as going elsewhere, increasing activities, activities of a bride, activities of taming cattle, activities of taking possession, and activities of curing illness.

original: g-yo ba'i las dag bya'o //
analyzed: g-yo ba'i las dag bya'o //
translated: One should perform moving activities.

original: chu srin gyi dus sbyor la /
analyzed: chu srin gyi dus sbyor la /
translated: When the aquatic period arises,

original: zhing las dang / brtan pa brtsal ba'i las dang / chu'i las dang / rgyu 'grul bya ba dang / bcings ba bkrol ba dang / chu brtol bar bya ba dang / g-yog mo gzhug pa dang / rkang pa'i las dang / rnga mo'i las dag bya'o //
analyzed: zhing las dang / brtan pa brtsal ba'i las dang / chu'i las dang / rgyu 'grul bya ba dang / bcings ba bkrol ba dang / chu brtol bar bya ba dang / g-yog mo gzhug pa dang / rkang pa'i las dang / rnga mo'i las dag bya'o //
translated: one should perform field activities, activities of seeking stability, water activities, activities of traveling by vehicle, activities of releasing bonds, activities of crossing water, activities of engaging a servant, activities of the feet, and activities of the camel.üîΩ When the pot period arises,

original: bum pa'i dus sbyor shar ba dang / gru ba'i las thams cad dang / chu sbyin pa dang / brtan pa'i las dang / sa bon bsdu ba'i las rnams bya'o //
analyzed: bum pa'i dus sbyor shar ba dang / gru ba'i las thams cad dang / chu sbyin pa dang / brtan pa'i las dang / sa bon bsdu ba'i las rnams bya'o //
translated: one should perform all activities of the boat, give water, perform stable activities, and perform activities of collecting seeds.

original: nya yi dus sbyor shar ba dang / rig pa rtsom pa dang / rgyan 'dogs pa dang / bzo'i las dang / so nam bya ba dang / phyugs kyi las dang / sgyu 'phrul bya ba dang / bza' ba dang / bag ma dang / chos slob pa la sogs pa mkhas pa'i las bya'o //
analyzed: nya yi dus sbyor shar ba dang / rig pa rtsom pa dang / rgyan 'dogs pa dang / bzo'i las dang / so nam bya ba dang / phyugs kyi las dang / sgyu 'phrul bya ba dang / bza' ba dang / bag ma dang / chos slob pa la sogs pa mkhas pa'i las bya'o //
translated: When the lunar mansion of the fish arises, one should perform the activities of the wise, such as composing treatises, adorning, crafts, agriculture, animal husbandry, magic, eating, marriage, and teaching the Dharma.

original: 'pho ba yang de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'pho ba yang de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the transits in the same way.

original: dus sbyor brtag pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dus sbyor brtag pa rdzogs so /
translated: The examination of the lunar mansions is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i dza ya a'a nanda dang / chag lo ts'a ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i dza ya a'a nanda dang / chag lo ts'a ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o /
translated: It was translated by the Indian preceptor ≈örƒ´ J√±ƒÅnamitra and the Tibetan translator-monk Ch√∂je Pal.
